remarks:
Closure of addition on positive reals.  First statement of Proposition 9-3.5 of [Gleason] p. 123.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

 Closure of addition on positive reals.  First statement of Proposition 9-3.5 of [Gleason] p. 123.  Combination of Lemma 11.13 and Lemma 11.16 in [BauerTaylor], p. 53.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.)
statement: addclpr $p |- ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. ) -> ( A +P. B ) e. P. ) $.
